content.body: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/8467 looks like the spec has got approvals from annevk and Domenic. I'm curious what is the next step here? I've raised https://github.com/WebKit/WebKit/pull/22223 for WebKit to ship it by default, but I don't know if that's going to be blocked by the spec PR still being open? (I guess this could be counted as a friendly ping ðŸ˜‰).
